title: Client will not load after downloading, stuck on a picture of the logo with a white bar underneath.
body: I've recently reinstalled the game, but after the installation, when I try to launch the game, the client will not appear, only the League of Legends logo with a white bar underneath. Please help. Thanks.

replies.body:
The first thing I'd recommend you do is to ensure you're launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*). If you still see this issue occur, then it means that your patcher cannot connect to our patching servers. This could be for any number of reasons, but our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will cover steps that usually resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.
